description: e-Services & e-Transaction Development & Knowledge Society at the Ministry of Foregin Affairs MOFA -Phase#1

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: The aim of this project is to increase the efficiency and productivity of MOFA activities and to ensure the implementation of the National Plan for Communications and Information Technology through switching to electronic services and transactions. The activities of this project include: broadening the scope of the e-services and e- transactions available, developing human capacity, improving technological infrastructure, improving connectivity, increasing access to the Web and applying quality standards.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: e-Services & e-Transaction Dev
